answers.answer: Its probably nothing. My feet, legs,hands, and face have been swollen for months now. The swelling in my hands is even giving me alot of problems like squising or hold small objects is super hard and my wrist is hurting when i pick stuff up. Dr told me its very normal. My blood pressure has been fantastic and ive had no other big issues.

I've had swelling on and off in my hands, feet an ankles since abt 18w. My bp was normal so my Dr just advised me to watch my salt intake and double how much water I was drinking. It's better now so that could be a possible reason for yours as well.

question: Hands a little swollen, my feet are not they just hurt a lot if im even on my feet for like half hour...im 21 weeks pregnant have some pain on my right side buut my blood pressure is normal? Im callin my doctor tomorrow I just want opinions!
title: preeclampsia?
